item.title: German Christmas market attack suspect remanded
item.description: A man suspected of the murders of a nine-year-old boy and four women at the market in Magdeburg has appeared in court.

item.title: Lara Trump withdraws name from consideration for US Senate
item.description: The president-elect's daughter-in-law had been spoken of as a replacement for Senator Marco Rubio.

item.title: Blake Lively accuses co-star Justin Baldoni of smear campaign
item.description: Mr Baldoni's lawyer says the allegations are "categorically false" and a "desperate attempt to 'fix' her negative reputation".

item.title: Gaza ceasefire talks 90% complete, Palestinian official tells BBC
item.description: The senior official said a ceasefire deal is close but key issues remain that need to be bridged.

item.title: 'I heard rumbling and shattering glass': Eyewitness describes Christmas market attack
item.description: One woman describes how her boyfriend was dragged away from her after being hit by the car being used as a weapon.
